Texts.Chs: 我现在可以按下^green;[F]^reset;进入隐匿状态，我的下一次攻击的伤害将会翻倍，但移动速度会降低。
Texts.Eng: I can now press [f] when Phase Attack is active to vanish. My next attack will do x2 damage. Movement speed is slowed while sneaking.

Texts.Chs: 我设计出了可以调整自身颜色的科技。它可以让我融入周围环境。
Texts.Eng: I've devised a way to change my own body chemistry using technology. This should allow me to blend in to my surroundings and surprise foes with attacks.
